channel.title: Business on The Zombie Fridge Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Business on The Zombie Fridge Journal

item.title: Powell Announces Rate Hikes
item.description: Federal Reserve Board chairman Jerome Powell announced further rate hikes. This move is expected to force McDonald’s to increase the price of their soft drinks. The Department of Defense referred comment to the Department of the Treasury, asking, “why would you even contact us for an opinion on this?” The Department of Defense referred comment to the Department of the Treasury, asking, “why would you even contact us for an opinion on this?
